Customer Profile Images
=====================

This directory should contain actual customer profile photos for the reviews section.

Current placeholder images from randomuser.me should be replaced with:
- Real customer photos (with permission)
- Professional headshots
- Images sized to 200x200px or larger (will be displayed at 52x52px)
- Optimized JPG or WebP format

Image naming convention:
- customer-1.jpg
- customer-2.jpg
- etc.

Remember to update the image paths in /data/reviews.yaml when adding real photos.
